name: resssca
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4

stmt.origin: resslem(c0, c1, c2, csca, c3, c4, nat5)
stmt.pretty: resslem(c0, c1, c2, csca, c3, c4, nat5)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(csca, c3)))
-| wceq(c3, co(c4, cress, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(csca, c4))
-| wceq(csca, cslot(nat5))
-| wcel(nat5, cn)
-| wbr(nat1, clt, nat5)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 =(Scalar ` c3))
⊣ c3 =(c4[|`s]c0)
⊣ c2 =(Scalar ` c4)
⊣ Scalar = Slot(5)
⊣ 5 ∈ ℕ
⊣ 1[<]5

-| wceq(csca, cslot(nat5))
-| wcel(nat5, cn)
-| wbr(nat1, clt, nat5)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 =(Scalar ` c3))
⊣ c3 =(c4[|`s]c0)
⊣ c2 =(Scalar ` c4)
⊣ Scalar = Slot(5)
⊣ 5 ∈ ℕ
⊣ 1[<]5

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(csca, c3)))
-| wceq(c3, co(c4, cress, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(csca, c4))

-| wbr(nat1, clt, nat5)

-| wceq(c3, co(c4, cress, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(csca, c4))
-| wbr(nat1, clt, nat5)

-| wceq(c3, co(c4, cress, c0))

comment: ` Scalar ` is unaffected by restriction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Dec-2014.)
